mapper.select: SELECT p.ID, p.PLATFORM_KEY, p.SECRET_KEY, p.PLATFORM_NAME, p.TOKEN_LIMIT_TIME * 60 AS TOKEN_LIMIT_TIME, ssi.SCOPE_NAME, ssi1.SCOPE_NAME AS AUTO_SCOPE_NAME, gti.GRANT_TYPE_NAME FROM pcsp_sys_platform_info p LEFT JOIN pcsp_sys_platform_scope ps ON ps.PLATFORM_ID = p.ID LEFT JOIN pcsp_sys_scope_info ssi ON ssi.ID = ps.SCOPE_ID LEFT JOIN pcsp_sys_platform_scope ps1 ON ps1.PLATFORM_ID = p.ID AND ps1.AUTO_FLAG = 1 LEFT JOIN pcsp_sys_scope_info ssi1 ON ssi1.ID = ps1.SCOPE_ID LEFT JOIN pcsp_sys_platform_grant_type g ON g.PLATFORM_ID = p.ID LEFT JOIN pcsp_sys_grant_type_info gti ON gti.ID = g.GRANT_TYPE_ID AND p.PLATFORM_KEY = #{clientId}
